string.text: Our territory - the base of the Duty faction. We're very picky about who we let into our home. Remember that!

Oh, that ghoul. You look like a serious man, but you're running errands? Okay, you go along the fence, when you get to the stream, there's a building there. Look for him there. I don't need him. Yes... Hey, uh, hi to Phil. I guess we'll see each other again.
